TriggerOraclev10g.name: AIR_MERCHANT_ACCOUNTS
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
declare
v_sysdate date := sysdate ;
begin

/*
* JOURNALING SECTION
*
* PURPOSE: To keep an history of the merchant account active flag, and other parameters
*
* EXCEPTIONS: Name:
* Code:
* Desc:
*
*
* REVISIONS:
* Date Author Description
* --------- ------ ----------------------------------------
* 30 Apr 03 Erik Mailhiot 1. Created
* 28 Apr 04 Diane Arjoon 1. Added code for historic of MECAT_CODE and ACCOCT_ACCOUNT_CATEGORY_CDE fields
* 06 May 04 Diane Arjoon 1. Added code for historic of CRCPS_STATE field'
* 06 Jan 06 Ioana D. 1. Added firept_cde column
* 14 Jun 06 Diane Arjoon 1. Added code for historic of RULE_DISPLAY_ID field
* 06 Nov 07 Erik Mailhiot 1. Added code for historic of DEF_FRAUD_SVCS field
* 2. Removed code for historic of RULE_DISPLAY_IND field
* 18 Feb 10 Erik Mailhiot 1. Added journaling for new SETT_BATCH_DELAY_IN_HOURS column
* 05 May 10 Anil Nair 1. Added journaling for IP_ADDRESSS column
* 19 Apr 13 Erik Mailhiot 1. Added journaling for new RRE_BEHAVIOR_CDE column
* 16 Jul 13 Andy Yee 1. Added journaling for new AUTO_DISPUTE_IND column
* 30 Jun 14 Jiac 1. Added journaling for PREVENT_OVERDRAFT
* CVS info: $Id: air_merchant_accounts.sql,v 1.8 2013/07/18 13:59:50 yeea Exp $
*
* NOTES:
*/

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
active_flag,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
:new.active_flag,
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
mecat_code,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.mecat_code,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
accoct_account_category_cde,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.accoct_account_category_cde,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
crcps_state,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.crcps_state,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
firept_cde,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.firept_cde,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
def_fraud_svcs,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.def_fraud_svcs,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
sett_batch_delay_in_hours,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.sett_batch_delay_in_hours,0),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
ip_addresss,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.ip_addresss,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
rre_behavior_cde,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.rre_behavior_cde,'NULL'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
auto_cb_dispute_ind,
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
nvl(:new.auto_cb_dispute_ind,'Y'),
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);

insert into merchant_accounts_jn (
account_id,
prevent_overdraft, -- not null
mercaj_from_date,
modified_by
) values (
:new.account_id,
:new.prevent_overdraft,
v_sysdate,
:new.modified_by
);


exception when others then
raise_application_error (-20001, 'air_merchant_accounts trig, ' || SQLERRM);
end;
END AIR_MERCHANT_ACCOUNTS;
